email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Should Gtk be a namespace?
[PHP-GTK-DEV] Re: Should Gtk be a namespace?
email.body:
If you can, vote on twitter to get centered to my mind
https://twitter.com/ScornInPC/status/1146740464541995009
Thank you
- - - Bruno Pitteli Gonçalves AndOr - https://andor.com.br/ General - http://www.agenciageneral.com.br/
On Thu, Jul 4, 2019 at 9:03 AM Bruno P. Gonçalves <scorninpc@gmail.com> wrote:
> I'm almost completing the implementation of Gtk classes, and by writing > some Gdk and GtkSourceView features, I came to doubt to use Gtk as a > namespace. > > I think it would be nice to have Gtk and Gdk as namespaces, like. > > $win = new \Gtk\Window(); > $win->show_all(); > \Gtk\main_quit(); > > The problem are. What the best place to add 3th party code? Like > SourceView? Inside Gtk namespace? on own namespace? > > $sv = new \Gtk\SourceView(); > > or > > $sv = new \GtkSource\View(); > > Any advice? > > - - - > Bruno Pitteli Gonçalves > AndOr - https://andor.com.br/ > General - http://www.agenciageneral.com.br/ >

email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] New 0.6 Beta release
email.body:
Hello all
New beta release out
Just download and run AppImage, without any compile, on Gtk environments, or just download gtk libs
https://github.com/scorninpc/php-gtk3/releases/tag/0.6-beta
Thank you
General news
- Added key property for GdkEvent for GtkEventKey
News
- Added GdkEventKey - Added GtkSourceView - Added GtkArrowType - Added GtkRecentChooserDialog - Added GtkStyleContext - Added GtkCssProvider - Added GdkWindow - Added GdkVisual - Added GtkWidget::get_style_context
Enums
- Added GtkSourceBackgroundPatternType - Added GtkSourceDrawSpacesFlags - Added GtkSourceSmartHomeEndType - Added GtkRecentChooserError - Added GtkRecentSortType - Added GdkAnchorHints - Added GdkByteOrder - Added GdkFilterReturn - Added GdkFullscreenMode - Added GdkGravity - Added GdkModifierIntent - Added GdkVisualType - Added GdkWMDecoration - Added GdkWMFunction - Added GdkWindowAttributesType - Added GdkWindowEdge - Added GdkWindowHints - Added GdkWindowWindowClass - Added GdkWindowType - Added GtkCssProviderError - Added GtkCssSectionType - Added GtkAlign - Added GtkBorderStyle - Added GtkJunctionSides - Added GtkRegionFlags - Added GtkSizeRequestMode - Added GtkStyleContextPrintFlags - Added GtkTextDirection - Added GtkWidgetHelpType
- - - Bruno Pitteli Gon=C3=A7alves AndOr - https://andor.com.br/ General - http://www.agenciageneral.com.br/

email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] New release 0.7 Beta
email.body:
New build guys
https://github.com/scorninpc/php-gtk3/releases
For more, follow me https://twitter.com/ScornInPC
Thank you all
General news
- Deleted c++ classes who represent constants of php. Added this classes of Php::Base, to complie faster and reduce final object size - Fixed warning of comparison error from GtkClipboard - Removed deprecated functions from GtkSourceView, GtkContainer - Change tests to support GTK 3.24
News
- Added GtkFixed - Added GtkListStore::remove - Added GtkListStore::insert - Added GtkListStore::insert_before - Added GtkListStore::insert_after - Added GtkListStore::prepend - Added GtkListStore::clear - Added GtkListStore::iter_is_valid - Added GtkListStore::swap - Added GtkListStore::move_before - Added GtkListStore::move_after
- - - Bruno Pitteli Gon=C3=A7alves AndOr - https://andor.com.br/ General - http://www.agenciageneral.com.br/

email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] New release 0.8 Beta
email.body:
Hello. New 0.8 release with news and improvements
Hope you like
https://github.com/scorninpc/php-gtk3/releases
General news
- Change GObject::connect to work with object class
News
- Added GtkNotebook_::get_action_widget - Added GtkNotebook_::set_action_widget - Added GtkNotebook_::get_group_name - Added GtkNotebook_::set_group_name - Added GtkNotebook_::set_current_page - Added GtkNotebook_::get_tab_detachable - Added GtkNotebook_::get_tab_reorderable - Added GtkStackSwitcher_::set_orientation - Added GtkStackSwitcher_::get_orientation - Added GtkEntryCompletion - Added GtkEntry::get_completion - Added GtkEntry::set_completion - Added GdkRGBA::red - Added GdkRGBA::green - Added GdkRGBA::blue - Added GdkRGBA::alpha - Added GtkFontButton - Added GtkColorButton - Rewrite all GtkWidget methods with generator - Added GdkEventKey::keycode -
- - - Bruno Pitteli Gon=C3=A7alves AndOr - https://andor.com.br/ General - http://www.agenciageneral.com.br/

email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] [PHP-BUG] Req #78146 [NEW]: true
email.body:
From: josephmambodr at gmail dot com Operating system: wordpress.com PHP version: 7.3Git-2019-06-11 (Git) Package: PHP-GTK related Bug Type: Feature/Change Request Bug description:true
Description: ------------ --- From manual page: https://php.net/filesystem.installation ---
Test script: --------------- "online marketing" https://josephmambodr.org
-- Edit bug report at https://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=78146&edit=1 -- Try a snapshot (PHP 5.4): https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=trysnapshot54 Try a snapshot (PHP 5.5): https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=trysnapshot55 Try a snapshot (trunk): https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=trysnapshottrunk Fixed in SVN: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=fixed Fixed in release: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=alreadyfixed Need backtrace: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=needtrace Need Reproduce Script: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=needscript Try newer version: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=oldversion Not developer issue: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=support Expected behavior: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=notwrong Not enough info: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=notenoughinfo Submitted twice: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=submittedtwice register_globals: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=globals PHP 4 support discontinued: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=php4 Daylight Savings: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=dst IIS Stability: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=isapi Install GNU Sed: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=gnused Floating point limitations: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=float No Zend Extensions: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=nozend MySQL Configuration Error: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=78146&r=mysqlcfg
-- PHP-GTK Development Mailing List (http://gtk.php.net/) To unsubscribe, visit: http://www.php.net/unsub.php

email.subject: Re: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Php 7.3 with Gtk3
email.body:
hahah Sorry. You started talking portuguese
So, i'm php member, but oauth from master not working to give me access
Anyway, it's better wait, no much people apear care, seen from stats of downloads and replaies
Lets finish it
Thank you
- - - Bruno Pitteli Gon=C3=A7alves AndOr - https://andor.com.br/ General - http://www.agenciageneral.com.br/
On Tue, Jun 25, 2019 at 11:46 PM Alexandre Pereira B=C3=BChler via php-gtk-= dev < php-gtk-dev@lists.php.net> wrote:
> Bruno, > Good night, > Please in English. > Your sources should be sent when you feel there is a change, a > correction, something relevant to publish. > So that more people can contribute. > In the development of php with gtk 3 it will be interesting to publish > after a certain amount of work. > So that the changes are well documented. > Thank you > > Em 25/06/2019 13:58, Bruno P. Gon=C3=A7alves escreveu: > > Boa tarde Alexandre > > > > Me diz uma coisa. Se eu der comite pro rep oficial, toda mudan=C3=A7a q= ue eu > > fizer, eu vou ter que mandar novamente pra la, e vc vai ter que dar mar= ge > > n=C3=A9? > > > > Estou querendo muito que o pessoal se engage mais, seria uma boa para > > come=C3=A7ar a documentar e tudo mais, s=C3=B3 que eu to fazendo muita = coisa, vai > dar > > um baita trabalho > > > > Ou tem forma mais simples, por que foi mal, sou da epoca do cvs > > > > Abra=C3=A7os, > > > > - - - > > Bruno Pitteli Gon=C3=A7alves > > AndOr - https://andor.com.br/ > > General - http://www.agenciageneral.com.br/ > > > > > > On Sun, Jun 16, 2019 at 5:35 PM Alexandre Pereira B=C3=BChler via php-g= tk-dev > < > > php-gtk-dev@lists.php.net> wrote: > > > >> Tranquilo. > >> Obrigado > >> > >> Em 16/06/2019 14:58, Bruno P. email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Php 7.3 with Gtk3
email.body:
hello
I'm working a few days on a functional phpgtk ext.
https://github.com/scorninpc/php-gtk3
You can compile, or you can download appimage with all, on linux systems
I need alot work, not only to bind, but to review my code, do tests, etc ..
I glad if you guys appreciate
- - - Bruno Pitteli Gon=C3=A7alves bruno@pitteli.com.br
- - - ScornInPC - http://bruno.pitteli.com.br/ <http://blog.scorninpc.com/> Browse Happy - http://browsehappy.com/

email.subject: Re: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Php 7.3 with Gtk3
email.body:
Bruno, Boa noite, Se quiser eu upo o fontes e os executáveis no http://gtk.php.net/ com os devidos créditos e coloco como em "desenvolvimento". Eu tenho total acesso aos repositórios: https://people.php.net/buhlerax Obrigado
Em 15/06/2019 23:07, Bruno P. Gonçalves escreveu: > hello > > I'm working a few days on a functional phpgtk ext. > > https://github.com/scorninpc/php-gtk3 > > You can compile, or you can download appimage with all, on linux systems > > I need alot work, not only to bind, but to review my code, do tests, etc .. > > I glad if you guys appreciate > > - - - > Bruno Pitteli Gonçalves > bruno@pitteli.com.br > > - - - > ScornInPC - http://bruno.pitteli.com.br/ <http://blog.scorninpc.com/> > Browse Happy - http://browsehappy.com/ >
-- Alexandre Pereira Bühler
Simão & Bühler Ltda (Infobrindes) http://www.simaoebuhler.com.br alexandre@simaoebuhler.com.br Telefone: (41) 3039-5428

email.subject: Re: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Php 7.3 with Gtk3
email.body:
Esqueci de dizer como você deve fazer. Faça um clone o php-gtk pelo github. Então pelo git do php.net eu faço o merge. Assim os créditos serão seus. Me chame em PVT se quiser mais orientações. Estou muito feliz de ver o seu esforço em manter o php-gtk vivo. Parabéns.
Em 16/06/2019 00:43, Alexandre Pereira Bühler via php-gtk-dev escreveu: > Bruno, > Boa noite, > Se quiser eu upo o fontes e os executáveis no http://gtk.php.net/ > com os devidos créditos e coloco como em "desenvolvimento". > Eu tenho total acesso aos repositórios: https://people.php.net/buhlerax > Obrigado > > Em 15/06/2019 23:07, Bruno P. Gonçalves escreveu: >> hello >> >> I'm working a few days on a functional phpgtk ext. >> >> https://github.com/scorninpc/php-gtk3 >> >> You can compile, or you can download appimage with all, on linux systems >> >> I need alot work, not only to bind, but to review my code, do tests, >> etc .. >> >> I glad if you guys appreciate >> >> - - - >> Bruno Pitteli Gonçalves >> bruno@pitteli.com.br >> >> - - - >> ScornInPC - http://bruno.pitteli.com.br/ <http://blog.scorninpc.com/> >> Browse Happy - http://browsehappy.com/ >> >
-- Alexandre Pereira Bühler

email.subject: Re: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Php 7.3 with Gtk3
email.body:
Oi Alexandre
Eu prefiro terminar a implementa=C3=A7=C3=A3o dos widgets por completo prim= eiro, mas com certeza vamos fazer isso sim.
Eu tenho perspectiva de 2 ou 3 meses, nesse ritmo que estou
Abra=C3=A7os
- - - Bruno Pitteli Gon=C3=A7alves bruno@pitteli.com.br
- - - ScornInPC - http://bruno.pitteli.com.br/ <http://blog.scorninpc.com/> Browse Happy - http://browsehappy.com/

email.subject: Re: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Php 7.3 with Gtk3
email.body:
Boa tarde Alexandre
Me diz uma coisa. Se eu der comite pro rep oficial, toda mudan=C3=A7a que e= u fizer, eu vou ter que mandar novamente pra la, e vc vai ter que dar marge n=C3=A9?
Estou querendo muito que o pessoal se engage mais, seria uma boa para come=C3=A7ar a documentar e tudo mais, s=C3=B3 que eu to fazendo muita cois= a, vai dar um baita trabalho
Ou tem forma mais simples, por que foi mal, sou da epoca do cvs
Abra=C3=A7os,
- - - Bruno Pitteli Gon=C3=A7alves AndOr - https://andor.com.br/ General - http://www.agenciageneral.com.br/
On Sun, Jun 16, 2019 at 5:35 PM Alexandre Pereira B=C3=BChler via php-gtk-d= ev < php-gtk-dev@lists.php.net> wrote:
> Tranquilo. > Obrigado > > Em 16/06/2019 14:58, Bruno P. Gon=C3=A7alves escreveu: > > Oi Alexandre > > > > Eu prefiro terminar a implementa=C3=A7=C3=A3o dos widgets por completo = primeiro, > mas > > com certeza vamos fazer isso sim. > > > > Eu tenho perspectiva de 2 ou 3 meses, nesse ritmo que estou > > > > Abra=C3=A7os > > > > - - - > > Bruno Pitteli Gon=C3=A7alves > > bruno@pitteli.com.br > > > > - - - > > ScornInPC - http://bruno.pitteli.com.br/ <http://blog.scorninpc.com/> > > Browse Happy - http://browsehappy.com/ > > > > > > On Sun, Jun 16, 2019 at 12:47 AM Alexandre Pereira B=C3=BChler via > php-gtk-dev < > > php-gtk-dev@lists.php.net> wrote: > > > >> Esqueci de dizer como voc=C3=AA deve fazer. > >> Fa=C3=A7a um clone o php-gtk pelo github. > >> Ent=C3=A3o pelo git do php.net eu fa=C3=A7o o merge. > >> Assim os cr=C3=A9ditos ser=C3=A3o seus. > >> Me chame em PVT se quiser mais orienta=C3=A7=C3=B5es. > >> Estou muito feliz de ver o seu esfor=C3=A7o em manter o php-gtk vivo. > >> Parab=C3=A9ns. > >> > >> Em 16/06/2019 00:43, Alexandre Pereira B=C3=BChler via php-gtk-dev esc= reveu: > >>> Bruno, > >>> Boa noite, > >>> Se quiser eu upo o fontes e os execut=C3=A1veis no http://gtk.php.n= et/ > >>> com os devidos cr=C3=A9ditos e coloco como em "desenvolvimento". > >>> Eu tenho total acesso aos reposit=C3=B3rios: > https://people.php.net/buhlerax > >>> Obrigado > >>> > >>> Em 15/06/2019 23:07, Bruno P. Gon=C3=A7alves escreveu: > >>>> hello > >>>> > >>>> I'm working a few days on a functional phpgtk ext. > >>>> > >>>> https://github.com/scorninpc/php-gtk3 > >>>> > >>>> You can compile, or you can download appimage with all, on linux > systems > >>>> > >>>> I need alot work, not only to bind, but to review my code, do tests, > >>>> etc .. > >>>> > >>>> I glad if you guys appreciate > >>>> > >>>> - - - > >>>> Bruno Pitteli Gon=C3=A7alves > >>>> bruno@pitteli.com.br > >>>> > >>>> - - - > >>>> ScornInPC - http://bruno.pitteli.com.br/ <http://blog.scorninpc.com/= > > >>>> Browse Happy - http://browsehappy.com/ > >>>> > >> -- > >> Alexandre Pereira B=C3=BChler > >> > >> Sim=C3=A3o & B=C3=BChler Ltda (Infobrindes) > >> http://www.simaoebuhler.com.br > >> alexandre@simaoebuhler.com.br > >> Telefone: (41) 3039-5428 > >> > >> Infobrindes (Sim=C3=A3o & B=C3=BChler Ltda) > >> Brindes e material promocional. > >> http://www.infobrindes.com.br > >> karin@infobrindes.com.br > >> Telefone: (41) 3082-8667 > >> > >> > >> -- > >> PHP-GTK Development Mailing List (http://gtk.php.net/) > >> To unsubscribe, visit: http://www.php.net/unsub.php > >> > >> > > -- > Alexandre Pereira B=C3=BChler > > Sim=C3=A3o & B=C3=BChler Ltda (Infobrindes) > http://www.simaoebuhler.com.br > alexandre@simaoebuhler.com.br > Telefone: (41) 3039-5428 > > Infobrindes (Sim=C3=A3o & B=C3=BChler Ltda) > Brindes e material promocional. > http://www.infobrindes.com.br > karin@infobrindes.com.br > Telefone: (41) 3082-8667 > > > -- > PHP-GTK Development Mailing List (http://gtk.php.net/) > To unsubscribe, visit: http://www.php.net/unsub.php > >

email.subject: Re: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Php 7.3 with Gtk3
email.body:
Bruno, Good night, Please in English. Your sources should be sent when you feel there is a change, a correction, something relevant to publish. So that more people can contribute. In the development of php with gtk 3 it will be interesting to publish after a certain amount of work. So that the changes are well documented. Thank you
Em 25/06/2019 13:58, Bruno P. Gonçalves escreveu: > Boa tarde Alexandre > > Me diz uma coisa. Se eu der comite pro rep oficial, toda mudança que eu > fizer, eu vou ter que mandar novamente pra la, e vc vai ter que dar marge > né? > > Estou querendo muito que o pessoal se engage mais, seria uma boa para > começar a documentar e tudo mais, só que eu to fazendo muita coisa, vai dar > um baita trabalho > > Ou tem forma mais simples, por que foi mal, sou da epoca do cvs > > Abraços, > > - - - > Bruno Pitteli Gonçalves > AndOr - https://andor.com.br/ > General - http://www.agenciageneral.com.br/ > > > On Sun, Jun 16, 2019 at 5:35 PM Alexandre Pereira Bühler via php-gtk-dev < > php-gtk-dev@lists.php.net> wrote: > >> Tranquilo. >> Obrigado >> >> Em 16/06/2019 14:58, Bruno P. Gonçalves escreveu: >>> Oi Alexandre >>> >>> Eu prefiro terminar a implementação dos widgets por completo primeiro, >> mas >>> com certeza vamos fazer isso sim. >>> >>> Eu tenho perspectiva de 2 ou 3 meses, nesse ritmo que estou >>> >>> Abraços >>> >>> - - - >>> Bruno Pitteli Gonçalves >>> bruno@pitteli.com.br >>> >>> - - - >>> ScornInPC - http://bruno.pitteli.com.br/ <http://blog.scorninpc.com/> >>> Browse Happy - http://browsehappy.com/ >>> >>> >>> On Sun, Jun 16, 2019 at 12:47 AM Alexandre Pereira Bühler via >> php-gtk-dev < >>> php-gtk-dev@lists.php.net> wrote: >>> >>>> Esqueci de dizer como você deve fazer. >>>> Faça um clone o php-gtk pelo github. >>>> Então pelo git do php.net eu faço o merge. >>>> Assim os créditos serão seus. >>>> Me chame em PVT se quiser mais orientações. >>>> Estou muito feliz de ver o seu esforço em manter o php-gtk vivo. >>>> Parabéns. >>>> >>>> Em 16/06/2019 00:43, Alexandre Pereira Bühler via php-gtk-dev escreveu: >>>>> Bruno, >>>>> Boa noite, >>>>> Se quiser eu upo o fontes e os executáveis no http://gtk.php.net/ >>>>> com os devidos créditos e coloco como em "desenvolvimento". >>>>> Eu tenho total acesso aos repositórios: >> https://people.php.net/buhlerax >>>>> Obrigado >>>>> >>>>> Em 15/06/2019 23:07, Bruno P. Gonçalves escreveu: >>>>>> hello >>>>>> >>>>>> I'm working a few days on a functional phpgtk ext. >>>>>> >>>>>> https://github.com/scorninpc/php-gtk3 >>>>>> >>>>>> You can compile, or you can download appimage with all, on linux >> systems >>>>>> I need alot work, not only to bind, but to review my code, do tests, >>>>>> etc .. >>>>>> >>>>>> I glad if you guys appreciate >>>>>> >>>>>> - - - >>>>>> Bruno Pitteli Gonçalves >>>>>> bruno@pitteli.com.br >>>>>> >>>>>> - - - >>>>>> ScornInPC - http://bruno.pitteli.com.br/ <http://blog.scorninpc.com/> >>>>>> Browse Happy - http://browsehappy.com/ >>>>>> >>>> -- >>>> Alexandre Pereira Bühler >>>> >>>> Simão & Bühler Ltda (Infobrindes) >>>> http://www.simaoebuhler.com.br >>>> alexandre@simaoebuhler.com.br >>>> Telefone: (41) 3039-5428 >>>> >>>> Infobrindes (Simão & Bühler Ltda) >>>> Brindes e material promocional. >>>> http://www.infobrindes.com.br >>>> karin@infobrindes.com.br >>>> Telefone: (41) 3082-8667 >>>> >>>> >>>> -- >>>> PHP-GTK Development Mailing List (http://gtk.php.net/) >>>> To unsubscribe, visit: http://www.php.net/unsub.php >>>> >>>> >> -- >> Alexandre Pereira Bühler >> >> Simão & Bühler Ltda (Infobrindes) >> http://www.simaoebuhler.com.br >> alexandre@simaoebuhler.com.br >> Telefone: (41) 3039-5428 >> >> Infobrindes (Simão & Bühler Ltda) >> Brindes e material promocional. >> http://www.infobrindes.com.br >> karin@infobrindes.com.br >> Telefone: (41) 3082-8667 >> >> >> -- >> PHP-GTK Development Mailing List (http://gtk.php.net/) >> To unsubscribe, visit: http://www.php.net/unsub.php >> >>
-- Alexandre Pereira Bühler
